But normally you just do it once unless it was done to early or you come out positive then you do another one but for 3 hours

It's normally taken between 24 and 28 weeks. Doctors will ordered it sooner if there's history of GD or type I or II diabetes in your family. There's 3 different tests that can be ordered, 1, 2 and 3 hours long. I was administered the 2 hour test, but everyone on here seems to have been given the 1 hour test. If you fail, they'll have you take the 3 hour test. If you have gestational diabetes, it can cause complications during pregnancy.
